description:
Quantity of goods carried

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
46231 Statistics of freight transport by road

Definition:
The quantity carried refers to the weight of the goods
transported. In all official statistics of freight
transport, the weight carried includes the weight of
packaging. The weight of the transport units carried (e.g.
containers and swap bodies) is also determined in all
statistics of freight transport. However, there are
differences between the individual statistics regarding the
way in which the weight of the transport units is recorded
and calculated and how it is taken into account in the
published results of the quantities carried.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Quantity of goods carried
